channel.title: 애드온 종류 on Scratch Addons
channel.description: Recent content in 애드온 종류 on Scratch Addons

item.title: Userscripts
item.description: What are they? Userscripts allow you to run code along Scratch pages - you can do stuff like add buttons, enhance the Scratch editor, or anything you can imagine. How do I add a userscript? Make sure to refresh Scratch Addons from chrome://extensions after doing any changes to your addon. Go to the manifest of your addon (addon.json) and add a property called userscripts". This property must be an array.
